channel.title: Girls on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Girls on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Zosia Mamet Calls ‘Mad Men’ Showrunner Matthew Weiner “Very Strict” After Revelations in New Book
item.description: The actress dives into her collection of essays ‘Does This Make Me Funny?,’ which includes a buzzy story about leaving one of the biggest shows on TV after being screamed at by the showrunner.

item.title: Why Zosia Mamet Quit One of the Biggest Shows on Television (Exclusive Excerpt)
item.description: In an excerpt from her new collection of essays, ‘Does This Make Me Funny?’, 37-year-old Zosia Mamet — daughter of David, Shoshanna on ‘Girls’ — recalls the on-set showrunner freakouts she experienced

item.title: ‘Too Much’ Stars Megan Stalter and Will Sharpe Unpack That Finale Wink
item.description: The Netflix romantic dramedy from ‘Girls’ creator Lena Dunham follows Jessica (Stalter) and Felix (Sharpe)’s whirlwind relationship.
